course_title: Freshmen Seminar: Korean: Global Hist.of Letter Writing
class_notes:
Class description:
Exploring diverse communicative practices in world history, from the ancient period to contemporary society, this course considers the ways letters and other similar communicative tools have posed questions about interiority, sociability, identity, culture, and gender formation.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in New Psyc Bldg 225 (36 Eagle Ro
